Title: Ben X
Writer: Nic Balthazar (novel), Rik D'Hiet (advisor on screenplay), Carl Joos (advisor on screenplay), Bram Renders (advisor on screenplay)
Actors: Marijke Pinoy, Greg Timmermans, Cesar De Sutter, Gilles De Schryver
Plot: As an alternative to getting bullied at school, an autistic teenager retreats into the world of online role-playing games.
